title: CulTourist
text: This application takes in user comments about the culture, scams, slang, and nuances of a particular country to help future travelers be informed while abroad.

title: Eat-Da-Burger App
text: This is burger logger app with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!)

title: Employee Team Roster
text: This is a team generator command line app that prompts the user to create a team roster and prints to a new website.

title: Work Day Scheduler
text: This is a simple JS calendar app that allows users to save events for each hour of the day.

title: Fitness Tracker
text: This is a workout tracker app that utilizes MongoDB and routes with Express.

title: Readme Generator
text: A Node.js command line app that dynamically generates a professional README file using Inquirer and FS packages.
